channel.title: Best Practices on Entroware Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Best Practices on Entroware Documentation

item.title: Filing An Effective Support Ticket
item.description: A crucial part of resolving support tickets is diagnostics. Following this guide, you will be able to provide your support representative with as much detail as possible, reducing the time for a resolution or even resolve issues yourself.

item.title: Battery Best Practices
item.description: Lithium Polymer (LiPo) batteries have a natural lifespan due to electrolyte decomposition over time. Follow these best practices to make sure you can get the most out of yours.
